MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA3 postcode area of Linwood, affecting customers on Riverside Cottage and surrounding areas. Our engineers are currently onsite near the Glasgow Airport substation investigating the fault and we still expect all power to be restored by midday. We understand that to be without power is frustrating and we apologise for this. We will update this message if this information changes. Thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:17am on  Sunday, 06 December 2020
